metadata.title: CVE-2024-0813 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in Reading Mode in Google Chrome prior to 121.0.6167.85allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install a malicious extensionto potentially exploit heap corruption via specific UI interaction.(Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
